title: Match 3 Puzzle Games Sound Effects And Music Pack
description: Dive into a world of satisfying sounds with the Match 3 Games SFX and Music Pack! This pack is bursting with bubbly sound effects and magical melodies that will bring your match-3 game to life.
longDescription:
Dive into a world of satisfying sounds with the Match 3 Games SFX and Music Pack! Inspired by popular games such as Candy Crush, Toon Blast and Royal Match, this pack is bursting with bubbly sound effects and magical melodies that will bring your match-3 game to life. With a variety of sound characters like bubbly, magical, boxy, and candy, you can create a unique identity that perfectly complements your game's theme and visual style.


This pack of royalty-free content includes; 

⦿ 1 x Loopable Music Track

⦿ 4 x Stingers 

⦿ 181+ Sound Effects


Match 3 Games Sound Effects and Music Pack is mostly used in Puzzle, Match 3 Puzzle, Match 3D, Match Tile, Match Puzzle, Match Pair, Merge Game, Merge Puzzle, Pairing Game, Arcade Idle, Word Puzzle, Hybrid-casual, Hyper-casual, Casual games.


This sound effects and music pack includes; 

⦿ Music tracks

⦿ Stingers

⦿ Match

⦿ Move

⦿ Interact

⦿ Rattle

⦿ Booster

⦿ Skill

⦿ Click

⦿ Swipe

⦿ Fillup

⦿ Notification

⦿ Success

⦿ Chest

⦿ Countdown

⦿ Applause
